★ Release Notes: 2022-06-27 ★
≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡

Thanks for upgrading to the latest version of the ALKS CLI!

* Adds a trust policy flag to the `createtrustrole` option. Input format is of JSON String
Have feedback? https://github.com/Cox-Automotive/ALKS-CLI/issues
 
☁☁☁☁☁☁  Happy Clouding! ☁☁☁☁☁☁
